Headline: #65 Grand Temporary Reroute at Grand/Lamon
ShortDescription: #65 Grand buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via Grand, Armitage, Cicero, Grand, due to a street blockage near Grand/Lamon.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#65 Grand buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via Grand, Armitage, Cicero, Grand, then resume their normal route on Grand, due to a street blockage near Grand/Lamon.

Allow extra travel time.
